sourcesContent:
export const modernTheme = {
  colors: {
    primary: '#3B82F6',      // Modern blue
    secondary: '#10B981',     // Modern emerald  
    accent: '#8B5CF6',        // Modern purple
    background: '#0F172A',    // Dark slate
    backgroundLight: '#1E293B', // Slate 800
    backgroundMedium: '#334155', // Slate 700
    backgroundDark: '#0F172A',   // Slate 900
    surface: '#1E293B',       // Slate 800
    surfaceHover: '#334155',  // Slate 700
    text: '#F8FAFC',         // Almost white
    textSecondary: '#CBD5E1', // Slate 300
    textMuted: '#64748B',     // Slate 500
    success: '#10B981',       // Emerald 500
    error: '#EF4444',         // Red 500
    warning: '#F59E0B',       // Amber 500
    info: '#3B82F6',          // Blue 500
    border: '#374151',        // Gray 700
    borderLight: '#4B5563',   // Gray 600
  },
  fonts: {
    primary: "'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif",
    title: "'Poppins', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif",
    display: "'Space Grotesk', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif",
    mono: "'JetBrains Mono', 'Fira Code', Consolas, monospace",
    button: "'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif",
  },
  breakpoints: {
    mobile: '480px',
    tablet: '768px',
    desktop: '1024px',
    wide: '1200px',
  },
  spacing: {
    xs: '4px',
    sm: '8px',
    md: '16px',
    lg: '24px',
    xl: '32px',
    xxl: '48px',
  },
  borderRadius: {
    sm: '4px',
    md: '8px',
    lg: '12px',
    xl: '16px',
    round: '50%',
  },
  shadows: {
    xs: '0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)',
    sm: '0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
    md: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
    lg: '0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)',
    xl: '0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04)',
    '2xl': '0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)',
    inner: 'inset 0 2px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
    glow: '0 0 20px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.3)',
    glowPurple: '0 0 20px rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.3)',
    glowGreen: '0 0 20px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3)',
  },
  animations: {
    fadeIn: 'fadeIn 0.3s ease-out',
    slideUp: 'slideUp 0.3s ease-out',
    slideDown: 'slideDown 0.3s ease-out',
    scaleIn: 'scaleIn 0.2s ease-out',
    spin: 'spin 1s linear infinite',
    pulse: 'pulse 2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite',
    bounce: 'bounce 1s infinite',
  },
  zIndex: {
    background: -1,
    base: 0,
    dropdown: 1000,
    modal: 1100,
    notification: 1200,
    tooltip: 1300,
  },
};
